info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...GUSTY WIND WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIANA... NORTHERN BEAVER...SOUTHERN LAWRENCE AND WEST CENTRAL BUTLER COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, radar indicated a shower and thunderstorm cluster centered near New Waterford, or near Columbiana, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Beaver Falls, Columbiana, East Palestine, Ellwood City, Zelienople, Oakwood, Leetonia, New Waterford, Big Beaver, New Beaver, and West Mayfield. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 18. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 86 and 87. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
